Sr. Designer, Design Lead, UX Manager

I’m Bardia, a design leader, with over a decade of experience in SaaS platforms, fintech and non-profit industries.

I specialize in systems thinking, scalable design strategies and building conversion optimized experiences.

2020

Leveling up CPA Canada's member news email

  • Search Experience
  • UX Design
  • Visual Design

I designed and built an award-winning lifestyle-based search tool using rich demographic, psychographic, and location data. Instead of filtering by price or size, users explore custom neighbourhoods that reflect how they live.
